name: Hazy Flower
author: DreadKnight
notes:
I am sad that Gladiator Beasts didn't work out for me this season but at least they got me to Legend 2. I just got tired of seeing Burn.
Anyways Fenghuang was a surprisingly decent tech since it can wipe out the entire backrow, and it also bounces back so you don't have to worry about Lava Golem.

Also my KoG rank up duel was literally someone scooping after they saw that they were using Odion without his Skill.

I don't think Cosmic Cyclone was that relevant in my duels, accept for one when I got rid of someone's Mausoleum after the payed the cost and someone who was using Toon World, so feel free to replace it with Big Cattle Drive.
